abstract: This paper provides non-technical decision-makers in the offshore E&P industry with an overview of artificial intelligence and machine learning applications relevant to optimizing platform operations. It describes the benefits of using these applications to tap a platform's most underutilized asset — its data troves — using these applications to enhance decision support and drive better business outcomes, even new business models. Examples and use-case scenarios are provided, along with a step-wise approach for implementing the applications to unlock business value.
